landing_text.header:
Hi, I`m 
 Adrian Stan, and 
 I build things for the web.
landing_text.text: I’m a self-taught software developer with almost 3 years experince of building web related projects. My interest in web development started back in 2018

aboutMe.text: Self-taught passionate developer from Romania, currently working on personal projects, most notable cand be found below. I've been building stuff on the web for almost 3 years.

projects.title: Movies API
projects.header: Api that provides data from Imdb
projects.description:
Api for Imdb data, movies and series. 
 Based on complete and daily updated database with ~ 9 million titles. 
 This api is available on Rapid Api as Data-Imdb V2 and has around 1 million calls every month, average error rate below 1%. 
 Futures plans are to make this api an independent app not dependent on Rapid Api infrastructure. 
 Data collected with a scraper developed with python

projects.title: Xcote App
projects.header: A web app that provides odds and live info for sporting events
projects.description:
Compares odds for sporting events and provides live info and live odds. 
 The information provided is scraped by the app backend from four of the biggest romanian sportsbooks, and it is updated every minute.

projects.title: Portofolio App
projects.description: App build with React, typescript and styled components

projects.title: Title
projects.header: A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data
projects.description:
View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks 
 Detailed audio information about each track.. 
 Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more..

Contact.text: I’m currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or a proposal, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
